root.title: Bayan-Qol (е-100)
root.names: A stele from vicinity of Bayan-Qol
root.place: The stele was found from the right coast of Yenisei in 40 km north-east of the settlement Bayan-Qol in south spur of Uyk mountain ridge.
root.general: The stele of fine grained sandstone consists of some fragments.
root.description: The inscription is on four sides of the big stele.
root.size: Height - 134 cm, length - 25 cm, width - 15 см; height - 118 cm, length - 41 cm, width - 10 cm

pdf.f_title: Памятники тюркской рунической письменности азиатского ареала.
